findings.title: RS - Redundant Statements
findings.description: The contract contains code segments with fixed numbers that will never be executed.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract is using variables that initialize them only in the constructor, but they are not defined as immutable.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract contains dead code that is never executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The contract uses unnecessary boolean equalities when comparing two boolean values.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The contract uses an unstable compiler version that may produce vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful.
